pages.title: Artifacts
pages.text: $(l)Artifacts$() are a crucial part of opening $(l)The Final Vault$(). $(br2)There are $(l)25$() different Artifacts to collect. Together they line up to create a 5x5 Artifact Wall.

Undifentified Artifacts have a chance to spawn in $(l)Reward Crates$() that you receive when completing a Vault Objective. $(br2)Burning an Artifact creates an $(l)Artifact Fragment$(). Four Artifact Fragments can be used to create a new Unidentified Artifact. This way you can use any duplicate Artifact to create a new one.
